title: Slay Belle Surprise Summoner Icon
body: I've achieved the reward, but I haven't received it. It's been about two or three days since I've achieved it, and I still have yet been able to receive it. I don't understand what's wrong? According to my Snowdown Tracker, I have earned it, but I don't have it...... Any help here?

replies.body:
I've looked at your account, and you do already have this icon actually. Keep in mind this icon was the same icon as the Snowdown 2013 one for wearing a Snowdown skin. We were offering it again this year in case players didn't earn it last year. However, you earned it last year already!

If you scroll down in your icon inventory you should be able to see it as it likely isn't at the top.
Ah, I was wondering about that when I first saw it. Wasn't sure if it was exact same one or slightly different. So it is the exact same one. I thought so.

Yeppers.  We clarified in the Support article and the official FAQ that it was the same one.

You can find the Support article here if you wanted to check it out: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203768010-Snowdown-2014-Guide#h2q1

Oh, a question I forgot to ask. I was wondering where there are less Harrowing/Snowdown icons to earn this year than last years. I think there was 5 or 6 icons to earn last year. This time, it was just 2 for Harrowing, 2 new ones for this year with a returning icon. So why is there less?? I was thinking of trying to get all types this time around.
Sorry, that's not my department so I'm not sure!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HaQjbtjr-some-serious-micellaneous-questions-for-riot-please-answer-c Oh, here's a question you might be able to answer. There's 3 of them, and I think you're able to answer the 3rd one. One is about the blade icon. I won one with Earnest Elf Tristana but didn't get the icon. So I was wondering if I needed to use a 2014 Snowdown skin to get it. Because I don't have the icon and it's been a few days now.
Okay, I overlooked my summoner icons. Thank you. I checked multiple times, but apparently I made a mistake, and confused it for another icon.
